Title: Object: Papyrus Sallier 1
Description: Papyrus Sallier I; sheet 2; Hieratic literary text recto and verso. Recto: col 2.1-3.3 Tale of Apophis and Seqenenra, col 3.4-3.5; Late Egyptian Miscellanies, col 3.5-3.11 "Be a Scribe, Not a Soldier", col 3.11-end "Instructions as to deliveries of cattle and farm produce" Verso: copy of recto 3.1-3.3.
Curator's comments: Published: Pharaonen Und Fremde Catalogue (Vienna 1994): No.302 Gardiner, Late Egyptian Miscellanies; Caminos Late Egyptian Miscellanies. Tale of Apophis and Seqenenra (this manuscript) is available on T.L.A. (http://aaew.bbaw.de/tla/)
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (322164) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/322164)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1994 7 Sep-26 Oct, Austria, Vienna, Museen der Stadt Wien, Pharanen und Fremde 2004 21 Mar-31 Oct, Hamm, Gustav Luebcke Museum, War and Peace in Ancient Egypt 2004 10 Dec-2005 17 Apr, Hamburg, Helms Museum, War and Peace in Ancient Egypt 2005 21 May-11 Sept, Mannheim, Reiss Museum, War and Peace in Ancient Egypt
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Red ink Checked for loan to USA 1990 Checked for loan to Vienna 1994 Checked for loan to Germany and Austria 2003 Checked for loan to Munich 2002 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: self adhesive tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A Curatorial condition comment: poor
